description:
In the calm before the storm, Dr. Hell makes a surprise appearance, and challenges Koji to settle everything with a 1-on-1 duel: Mazinger Z vs. Mechanical Beast Baron Ashura! But will Koji accept?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Getting Closer! Machine Beast Baron Asura!
接近! 機械獣あしゅら男爵!
